title: vadAnyEshvaram bhajEham
sahitya:
vadAnyEshvaram bhajEham sadA madAdi vrttim tyajEham mudA


anupallavi

 padAravindam Ananda kandam pAlita dEva gandharva brndam sadArccitam 
vinata vidhi mukundam sadguruguha cidAnandam sadA


caraNam   pashu pAsha mOcanam trilOcanam pancAnanam praNata gajAnanam 
shishupAla gOpa viditam muditam shivam bilva vaibhavam bhavam 
vishuddhyAdi nilayam maNivalayam vigata vikalpakam shrita kalpakam 
pashupatim jnAnAmbikApatim parashu mrga dharam nIla kandharam 
ashu bhakSayakaram abhaya varadakaram anAdya vidhyAharam shankaram
